subject: p11052935
Findings: A new area of consolidation has developed in the left lower lobe, and is concerning for developing pneumonia considering the clinical suspicion for this entity. Additional nonspecific patchy opacity at the periphery of the right lung base could reflect focal atelectasis, or an additional site of infection. Severe upper lobe predominant emphysema is again demonstrated. Cardiomediastinal contours are normal. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax is evident.
